name.baseName: coal washing; Separation of coal, gangue and clean coal washing
煤炭洗选;将煤炭、矸石、精煤洗选分离

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The mined coal needs to be transported to the coal preparation plant for processing and washing. There are two modes of transportation in this process. One is the long-distance automobile transportation mode, which consumes diesel oil or gasoline and produces direct carbon emissions. This part is included in the carbon emissions of transportation together with the carbon emissions generated by the logistics and internal personnel transportation of the coal preparation plant ; the other is the transportation mode of belt, mine car and so on, which is suitable for close distance transportation. The consumed electric energy is included in the indirect emission of carbon emission accounting, and the drying link of coal washing will also consume electric energy to produce carbon emission. In the process of coal washing, there will also be carbon emissions caused by water production. Among them, because the wastewater can be degraded, the data of organic materials are difficult to obtain, and the carbon emission accounting in the process of slime water treatment is not studied. Different coal washing plants in the washing process will also be accompanied by carbon emissions from raw coal consumption.

经过开采的煤需要运往洗煤厂进行加工洗选，这个过程有两种运输方式，一种是远距离输送的汽车运输方式，消耗柴油或者汽油等油品产生 直接的碳排放，该部分同选煤厂物流、内部人员运输产生的碳排放一同计入运输 的碳排放；另外一种是皮带、矿车等适用于近距离的输送的运输方式，消耗的电 能会计入碳排放核算的间接排放，入洗煤的干燥环节也会消耗电能产生碳排放； 煤炭洗选过程中还会有水的生产带来的碳排放，其中，由于废水中可以降解的 ， 有机材料数据难以获得，暂不作煤泥水处理过程中的碳排放核算研究；洗选环节 中不同的洗煤厂还会伴有原煤消耗产生的碳排放。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The resource reserves and storage-production ratio of Yongcheng mining area have higher advantages than other mining areas in the province. At present, there are five exploration coal mining areas and two coal prospecting prediction areas. The occurrence of coal seams in Yongcheng mining area is relatively stable, and the mining technical conditions are relatively simple. The dip angle of the minable coal seam is relatively flat, which is suitable for mechanized mining.
永城矿区的资源储量和储采比例与省内其他矿区相比具有较高的优势，现共划分 5 个勘探煤矿区、 2 个找煤预测区，永城矿区煤层的赋存较为稳定，开采技术条件也相对简单，可采煤层的倾角 比较平缓，适于机械化开采方式。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Coal washing process includes raw coal preparation, raw coal separation, drying after washing, dehydration and slime water treatment.
煤炭洗选加工过程中包括原煤准备、原煤分选、洗选后的干燥以及脱水和煤 泥水的处理等环节。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The coal washing process described is intended for the separation and purification of coal, obtaining clean coal that is suitable for use in applications requiring high-quality fuel or raw material. This includes various industries such as energy generation (power plants), metallurgical (coke production for steel manufacturing), and other applications where high-grade coal is a necessity. This coal washing data set could be particularly relevant for businesses operating within the Yongcheng mining area or similar geological contexts where the coal occurence is stable and the mining conditions are favorable for large-scale, mechanized extraction.
该煤炭洗选过程旨在分离和净化煤炭，获取适合于需要高质量燃料或原材料的应用的洁净煤。这包括能源产生（发电厂）、冶金（焦炭生产用于钢铁制造）等各种行业，以及其他需要高等级煤炭的应用。对于在永城矿区或类似地质条件下运营的企业，此洗煤数据集尤其相关，那里的煤炭赋存稳定，且采矿条件有利于大规模机械化开采。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for life cycle assessment purposes, it is important to consider the geological context and the specific mining condition as provided in the dataset. Users should also pay attention to the inclusion or exclusion of subsequent coal usage phases, such as transportation, combustion, or any processing post-washing. The applicability of the data should be in line with the technological realities of the Yongcheng mining area or similar contexts. Users should account for variations in quality and environmental impacts due to locale-specific mining practices, and the data should be updated or adapted to reflect technological advancements or changes in mining practices.
在使用这份数据集进行生命周期评估时，考虑数据集所提供的地质背景和具体的采矿条件非常重要。用户还应注意到包括或排除洗煤后煤炭使用阶段的情况，如运输、燃烧或任何洗后处理。数据的适用性应与永城矿区或相似背景的技术现实一致。用户应考虑由于特定采矿实践而导致的质量和环境影响的变化，并且数据应更新或调整以反映技术进步或采矿实践的变化。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The amount of coal washed is not described in the literature. It is assumed that there is no loss of coal from mining to washing, and the amount of coal washed = the amount of coal mined.
文献中没有说明洗选的煤炭量，假设：从开采到洗选过程中煤炭没有损耗，洗选煤炭量=开采煤炭量
Data on “diesel” consumption activity during the coal washing process at the Xinqiao Coal Mine Coal Washing Plant in 2013.
2013年新桥煤矿洗煤厂煤炭洗选过程中“柴油”消耗活动水平数据。
Data on “gasoline” consumption activity levels during the coal washing process at the Xinqiao Coal Mine Coal Washing Plant in 2013.
2013年新桥煤矿洗煤厂煤炭洗选过程中“汽油”消耗活动水平数据。
Data on “electricity” consumption activity levels during the coal washing process at the Xinqiao Coal Mine Coal Washing Plant in 2013.
2013年新桥煤矿洗煤厂煤炭洗选过程中“电”消耗活动水平数据。
Data on “water” consumption activity levels during the coal washing process at the Xinqiao Coal Mine Coal Washing Plant in 2013.
2013年新桥煤矿洗煤厂煤炭洗选过程中“水”消耗活动水平数据。

The amount of coal after washing is not described in the literature. It is assumed that there is no loss of coal during the washing process.The CO2 released in this process is all indirect emissions, so it is not displayed.
文献中没有说明洗选后的煤炭量，假设：洗选过程中煤炭没有损耗。此过程中释放的CO2全部为间接排放，所以不展示。
